cast.name: 安东尼娅·德斯普拉特 Antonia Desplat
尼古拉斯·马丁内斯 Nicolas Martinez
露易丝·马莱可 Louise Malek
皮埃尔·汉西塞 Pierre Hancisse
狄迪尔·弗拉蒙 Didier Flamand
安德烈亚·费雷奥尔 Andréa Ferréol

introduction: Rita thought her life was set: three decades of marriage, four kids, and a steady job managing the books for her husband Olivier's body shop. But everything unravels when she discovers Olivier's affair-with Olympe Costa, 38, a polished, ambitious executive at the luxury leather brand Valières. Olympe is everything Rita isn't: privileged, elegant, and fiercely successful. Determined to confront her rival, Rita storms into Valières' headquarters. But instead of the dramatic showdown she envisioned, fate takes an unexpected turn-Rita ends up as Olympe's assistant! Thrown together in the most improbable circumstances, the wife and the mistress form an uneasy alliance that gradually blossoms into an unlikely friendship. As Olivier fights to win back his wife and tensions mount, can this duo keep it together-or will their fragile bond be the next casualty?
